K, I bought Gladiator ages ago and play it once in a while, and have some 
questions about it.

1. I bought the full version for $10 from a store, but didn't register. 
Would registering have given me access to more scenarios or something like 
that? If it does, how can I get those scenarios now?

2. Is the ultimate goal of the game to beat Jakara (or whatever his name 
is)? Something that really bothers me about this game is it never says "The 
end" or "Congratulations, you win!" or anything... there just aren't any 
more opponents on the levels anymore.

3. Why are there golems and giant skeletons programmed in the game if they 
never show up in any ordinary scenarios?

I suppose that if the answer to 1. is "yes, registering would have gotten 
you more scenarios" then 2. and 3. kind of answer themselves... but these 
are all things I've been wondering for a while. Now, I'm not signed up for 
YahooGroups and I don't really know much about how they work, so I don't 
even know if this message will reach somebody, or if I'll even be able to 
read the answer if it does. So... if somebody gets this message, can you 
please just email me back at yourfaceisaface@...? Thanks very much.
